article.title: Opel Zafira Tourer Review
article.text:
Opel Zafira Tourer Review

The Opel Zafira Tourer makes its world best at this year's Geneva Motor Show (March 3 - 13). The vehicle provides a look into the future generation Opel Zafira Tourer monocab fashion leader. The idea car includes highest possible versatility with a top quality feel, leading to an suitable blend of performance and health and fitness. The Opel Zafira Tourer is a "lounge on wheels" with a light, breezy and high-class excellent internal that provides ample place for again travelers. It brings Insignia principles like aspirations, excellent and modern technological innovation to the monocab section while presenting Opel's style viewpoint sculptural skillfullness satisfies In in german perfection.
Opel Zafira Tourer
In the Zafira Tourer, Opel designers further developed the seven-seat Flex7 sitting idea developed by the Zafira, making it more innovative than ever.
The third row can still be completely collapsed down cleanse with the floor in the modern Zafira Tourer. Completely instantly at the push of a button, the five-seat settings can then be modified into a large four-seat again cottage with first-class feeling and living room character. Thanks to a brilliant new foldable process, the again of the middle chair in the second row stores to offer comfortable arm rests for the travelers in the external seating. These then fall again and towards each other, creating highest possible place for passengers' arms and legs and thus guaranteeing maximum leisure. With extended footrests, perfect sitting for leisure is created - the suitable place to relax.
